Articles.Content:
So I have been bored waiting for 0.24 to come out (go ahead and laugh, it's ok) and have been going through the challenges page, I have tried a few and even started one of my own!!

Somewhere along the way I decided that Jeb needed a little break and wanted to have some fun, I just couldn't decide where he was going to get his kicks from.

That's when I found this...

And I could just imagine Jeb sitting next to me, perk up and ask "Can I ride that rock back to KSP for us?". So this is what happened...

Ended up having a blast, even if I didn't score very big on my own challenge

Check out the whole mission here

https://imgur.com/a/XC8Hv
